EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF Roadshow_Q314.Email Confirm Request - India 12/3
EmailTemplate.subject: Important Changes to your Registration: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - India
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow in India on Thursday, December 4, 2014. Unfortunately, we are over capacity and cannot honor all registrations for that day. Due to the high demand for this workshop, we are hosting another event the day prior, Wednesday, December 3, 2014. The same agenda and content will be presented and the workshop will still be held at EMC Headquarters.
If you would like to join us on Wednesday, December 3, we ask that you confirm your attendance <http://connect.pivotal.io/PCF-Roadshow-India-12-3.html>.
Please RSVP for Wednesday, December 3 <http://connect.pivotal.io/PCF-Roadshow-India-12-3.html>, print your confirmation email and present upon your arrival to the event.
Should you fail to confirm your registration, we will not allow entry into the event.
Thank you for your understanding and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
